TopicTitle: Is There A Mod That Allows You To Build In-Flight?

Articles.Content:
I can't seem to find one. Maybe there is a mod that I missed or something?

Thnaks.

I am not sure what you meant by build in flight.

If you mean being able to spawn new ships in other places than KSC, then there is Extraplanetary LaunchPad.

If you mean being able to have kerbals EVA and do small patch jobs and stuff, Kerbal Attachment System is what you need.

But if you are asking for a full on editor in mid flight, I don't think that is possible.
Well, you could make a module manager config to add KASModuleGrab to all parts, and then use KAS. That would get one most of the way there.

Well, you could make a module manager config to add KASModuleGrab to all parts, and then use KAS. That would get one most of the way there.

I can only imagine what it would look like if a kerbal was carrying a jumbo fuel tank on his back.
I don't use it myself, but ActiveStruts may also apply to what you're asking.

Well, you could make a module manager config to add KASModuleGrab to all parts, and then use KAS. That would get one most of the way there.

PLUS saving all parts as subassemblies. Congratulations, you have modded a 3D-Printer into the game PROFIT
